commit.message: Only suggest adding `!` to expressions that can be macro invocation

files.patch:
@@ -11,16 +11,10 @@ LL |     struct SemiTransparent;
    |     ----------------------- similarly named unit struct `SemiTransparent` defined here
 ...
 LL |     semitransparent;
-   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ not a value
-   |
-help: use `!` to invoke the macro
-   |
-LL |     semitransparent!;
-   |                    +
-help: a unit struct with a similar name exists
-   |
-LL |     SemiTransparent;
-   |     ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
+   |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
+   |     |
+   |     not a value
+   |     help: a unit struct with a similar name exists: `SemiTransparent`
